projects.title: E-Commerce Redesign
projects.description: Complete redesign of a fashion e-commerce platform
projects.detailDescription: A full UX overhaul for a fashion e-commerce brand, focusing on conversion and mobile-first experience. The project included user research, wireframing, high-fidelity design, and design system documentation.

projects.title: SaaS Dashboard
projects.description: Analytics dashboard for a fintech startup
projects.detailDescription: Built a real-time analytics dashboard for a fintech SaaS product. Features include customizable widgets, data export, and role-based access control.

projects.title: Brand Identity System
projects.description: Comprehensive brand refresh for a tech company
projects.detailDescription: End-to-end brand identity project including logo design, color palette, typography, and brand guidelines for a B2B tech company.

projects.title: Mobile App Design
projects.detailDescription: Designed the full UI/UX for a fitness app that combines tracking with gamificationâ€”badges, streaks, and social challenges to boost engagement.
